pages.text: I had a dream, again. $(br)This time, I dreamt of a sun. But I did not only dream of glory or light. I dreamt of heat, the star itself, and its core.  Could I be the core? What if not my soul, but my body ascended? What if I could forge a machine for gods? What if I could reforge myself into such a god?
$(o)A beautiful tale of man and machine, a deus ex machina$()
